Articles.Content:
I destroy every hill on earth, and build a new hill on mars, before filling the earth’s atmosphere with decaying plutonium 238 (well, the kind in rtgs) dust, rendering it a tropical radioactive wasteland. I establish a government on mars with the express purpose of keeping mars’s natural beauty (It’s much prettier than earth, which is a high gravity, thick atmosphere, life-form filled wasteland) by preventing terraforming, other than giving it a thicker, oxygenated atmosphere. I build a hill within our largest military complex.   

My red Martian hill!   

(Yes, I really hate Earth, but just because I was born here, doesn’t mean it isn’t the worst planet (It is my least favorite planet.))

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-19T11:40:10Z" title="08/19/2021 11:40  AM" data-short="2 yr">August 19, 2021</time> by Hyperspace Industries**
  
Mars is superior to earth!

AllenLi's profile pic only includes some of Siberia, eastern Asia, and Oceania.

I build a brand new hill in Finland.

My finnish hill.

*(oops, mega-ninjad)* ~~My-my Tea Hill~~

Captain Phasma sends Finn away,

Phasma Hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-19T12:25:27Z" title="08/19/2021 12:25  PM" data-short="2 yr">August 19, 2021</time> by kerbiloid**

I replace the h with l so Phasma becomes Plasma and he can't do anything to me. 

I plant the flag of the Democratic Workers' Republic of Vyvelgaria (COMMUNISM!) on the hill.

Vyvelgaria's hill.

someone touched my hill

fine i build a new one

pls no touchie

I don't touch the hill:  

Dinamite does

I build a new hill  

My hill

Time passed.

Mummy hill.
Nobody replied to my latest reply in this threasd before this ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif ":mad:")

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Maria Sirona said:
> 
> 
> Vyvelgaria's hill.
> 

Weevils come and it's now Weevil Vinegar Hill.

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> Weevils come and it's now Weevil Vinegar Hill.
> 

A captain must always choose the lesser of 2 weevils for his crew.

I colonize the lesser Weevil Vinegar hill.

the weevils eat you, as these ones are carnivores

i then cover the hill in soup, drowning the weevils

my hill now

I throw some fire at the hill using a flamethrower, vaporising everything on it.

My burnt hill

an N-1 crashes into the hill 51 seconds after launch, vaporizing the surface.

my slightly flattened hill.

Elon kerman decided to build starbase 2 here, and launched the starship sn9 next to your hill

it exploded on landing, further vaporising the hill

 my very flattened hill

The wind starts blowing.

The very inflattened hill.

the wind becomes a tornado, and drops a MSC Oscar Cargo Container Ship on the hill.

my junk hill.

stop touching my hill ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(") let me have my own hill 

\*makes new hill\*

NOW DONT TOUCH OR MY NEXT HILL IS CURSED

I annihilate your new hill with a gigantic Mass Driver from orbit, blasting it to atoms.

(Strictly speaking, I didn't touch it...)

Then, I simply invert Earth's ~~heightmap~~ terrain, moutains become oceans, oceans become mountains, and the crater is now a hill.

My inverted crater hill.

I use some tunnel boring machines to drill into the side of your crater/hill/thing. After enough holes,  it then collapses.

Since most of the material is still physically there, just in the form of piles of loose rock, I compact it back together into a hill.

I lauch a missle and hits you and the top of the hill, destroing them  

My flat top hill

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-26T02:48:11Z" title="08/26/2021 02:48  AM" data-short="2 yr">August 26, 2021</time> by ffx**

Somebody has brought a bed and put it on the flat top.

A flatbed hill.

I rapidly launch nuclear missiles from my munar base towards your hill

i build a new hill with a force field around it

to further protect it, i use the mod kerbal konstructs to move the hill below the -250m kill limit on kerbol

My hill

A hotfix is released. The Kerbal Konstructs mod is temporarily unavailable.

An Invalid Resource Name Hill.

I hack the Matrix and delete your hill, and create one for myself

Matrix hill

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-27T15:31:43Z" title="08/27/2021 03:31  PM" data-short="2 yr">August 27, 2021</time> by Lewie**

i nuke it

i create a new floating hill in a vacuum entirely out of pure antimatter

anyone who sets foot on it would be destroyed
